sentences.en: a cape made of a soft material
sentences.cn: 用柔软布料制成的披肩

sentences.en: a paper company which imports raw materials (= substances which have not been treated ) from North America
sentences.cn: 从北美进口原材料的纸业公司

sentences.en: a society that places high importance on material rewards
sentences.cn: 重视物质回报的社会

sentences.en: According to some, the material world is all that exists.
sentences.cn: 有些人认为，物质世界就是存在的一切。

sentences.en: Anita is collecting material for a novel.
sentences.cn: 安妮塔正在收集小说素材。

sentences.en: Crude oil is used as the raw (= basic) material for making plastics.
sentences.cn: 原油是制造塑胶的原料。

sentences.en: curtain material
sentences.cn: 窗帘布

sentences.en: Dr Ryan travelled the world gathering material for his book.
sentences.cn: 瑞安博士周游世界为他的书搜集资料。

sentences.en: harmful radioactive material
sentences.cn: 有害的放射性材料

sentences.en: He finds material at auctions, antique shops and flea markets.
sentences.cn: 他在拍卖行、古玩店和跳蚤市场中寻宝。

sentences.en: His last book, "Needful Things", was a retread of tired material.
sentences.cn: 他的上一本书《必需品》尽在重复些老掉牙的内容。

sentences.en: In its untreated state the carbon fibre material is rather like cloth.
sentences.cn: 原始的碳纤维材料很像布料。

sentences.en: In my version of the story, I added some new material.
sentences.cn: 我在讲述这个故事时加入了新的素材。

sentences.en: materials like wood or stone
sentences.cn: 木材或石头之类的材料

sentences.en: My grumble is with the structure and organisation of the material.
sentences.cn: 我所不满的是素材的结构和组织。

sentences.en: recycled material
sentences.cn: 再生材料

sentences.en: scraps of material
sentences.cn: 碎布料

sentences.en: Scraps of material were saved, cut up and pieced together for quilts.
sentences.cn: 边角碎料都保留下来，剪好后拼在一起做成被子。

sentences.en: She enjoys the material comforts married life has brought her.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢婚姻生活带给她的物质享受。

sentences.en: The material can absorb outward-going radiation from the Earth.
sentences.cn: 该物质可以吸收地球向外辐射的能量。

sentences.en: The material consisted only of already published, unclassified information.
sentences.cn: 这份材料里只有一些已公开的、非保密性质的信息。

sentences.en: The nature and availability of material evidence was not to be discussed.
sentences.cn: 实质性证据的性质和可用性毋庸讨论。

sentences.en: There are still major lacunae in the material available.
sentences.cn: 手边的材料依然存在严重缺漏。

sentences.en: There is often a strong accent on material success.
sentences.cn: 经常大力强调物质成就。

sentences.en: They contend that the company failed to disclose material information.
sentences.cn: 他们坚持认为该公司并未透露实质性的信息。

sentences.en: This will give your promotional material individuality and style.
sentences.cn: 这会让你的促销品显得个性十足、格调高雅。

words.tran_cn: 唯物主义；唯物论；物质主义
唯物主义者；实利主义者
使具体化，使有形；使突然出现；使重物质而轻精神
重要的；[物]物质的，实质性的；肉体的

phrases.tran_cn: n. 物料流，物质流；原料周转

trans.tran_cn: 物质的，重要的，直接相关的
trans.tran_en: relating to the real world and physical objects, rather than religious or  spiritual  things

trans.tran_cn: 布料，原料，材料，素材，节目
trans.tran_en: cloth used for making clothes, curtains etc
